synopsis.text: To escape a scandal that tarnished his professional golfing career, Kazuyoshi Igarashi seeks refuge on the serene Tokara Islands, hoping to leave his past behind. As he settles into his new life, he stumbles upon a remarkable sight: a resourceful, makeshift golf course designed by the island's inhabitants. To his astonishment, he encounters Tonbo Ooi, a young girl with an exceptional talent for golf, who skillfully wields a notoriously challenging 3-iron club. Despite their shared love for the sport, both Igarashi and Tonbo have faced adversity in their pasts that threatens to hinder their true potential. As Igarashi becomes more involved with Tonbo, he begins to appreciate golf in a new light, rediscovering the joy and excitement that once captivated him. This chance encounter sets the stage for a transformative journey, as these two individuals find solace and redemption in each other and the sport they love.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
